description: Adorable, fit Casey Jacks presents his boyfriend with a new virtual reality game set to keep him distracted long enough for his sneaky side piece to come over and fuck him. Blond-haired babe Blake Ryder waits for just the right time to come inside, and shove his cock in Casey’s mouth. Casey mounts athletic Blake, and slides his bottom onto his hard pole, and all while his boyfriend is still in the room playing his game!
title: Don't Say A Word
